#labels Featured
<p>
Unzip <a href="http://code.google.com/p/ketai/downloads/detail?name=Ketai.zip&can=2&q=">Ketai.zip</a> and move to your sketchbook "libraries" folder. Restart Processing. Examples and Reference is included.
</p>

= v.04 Update log = 
<p>
- Support for new Sensors available in sdk v13
- support for location information
- Front facing camera support
- NFC Read/Write support (reads text/URI tags, writes text)
- Experimental Bluetooth RFCOMM support
</p>
